column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Jet says : " What are you doing ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " Shh ... It amplifies vibrations . "
#Text=Jet says : " Good trick . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Nothing yet .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I think there 's just one .
#Text=" Jet says : " Good work , Sokka .
#Text=Ready your weapon .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Wait , false alarm ... He 's just an old man .
#Text=" Jet says : " What are you doing in our woods , you leech ?
#Text=" Old Fire Nation civilian says : " Please sir , I 'm just a traveler .
#Text=" Jet says : " Do you like destroying towns ?
#Text=Do you like destroying families ?
#Text=Do you ?
#Text=" Old Fire Nation civilian says : " Oh ... Please let me go ... have mercy ... " Jet says : " Does the Fire Nation let people go ?
#Text=Does the Fire Nation have mercy ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Jet , he 's just an old man !
#Text=" Jet says : " He 's Fire Nation !
#Text=Search him !
#Text=" Sokka says : " But he 's not hurting anyone !
#Text=" Jet says : " Have you forgotten that the Fire Nation killed your mother ?
#Text=Remember why you fight !
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " We 've got his stuff , Jet .
#Text=" Sokka says : " This does n't feel right .
#Text=" Jet says : " It 's what has to be done , now let 's get outta here .
#Text=" Jet says : " Come on , Sokka !
#Text=" Aang says : " Sokka !
#Text=Look what the Duke gave me !
#Text=Ow !
#Text=Quit it !
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey , Sokka .
#Text=Is Jet back ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah he 's back .
#Text=But we 're leaving .
#Text=" Aang says : " What ?
#Text=" Katara says : " But I made him this hat .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Your boyfriend Jet 's a thug .
#Text=" Katara says : " What ?
#Text=No , he 's not .
#Text=" Sokka says : " He 's messed up Katara .
#Text=" Aang says : " He 's not messed up , he 's just got a different way of life , a really fun way of life .
#Text=" Sokka says : " He beat and robbed a harmless old man !
#Text=" Katara says : " I wan na hear Jet 's side of the story .
#Text=" Jet says : " Sokka , you told them what happened , but you did n't mention that the guy was Fire Nation ?
#Text=" Katara says : " No , he conveniently left that part out .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Fine !
#Text=But even if he was Fire Nation , he was a harmless civilian !
#Text=" Jet says : " He was an assassin , Sokka .
#Text=" Jet says : " See ?
#Text=There 's a compartment for poison in the knife .
#Text=.
#Text=He was sent to eliminate me ; you helped save my life , Sokka .
#Text=" Katara says : " I knew there was an explanation .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I did n't see any knife !
#Text=" Jet says : " That 's because he was concealing it .
#Text=" Katara says : " See , Sokka ?
#Text=I 'm sure you just did n't notice the knife .
#Text=" Sokka says : " There was no knife !
#Text=I 'm going back to the hut and packing my things .
#Text=" Jet says : " Tell me you guys are n't leaving yet .
#Text=I really need your help .
#Text=" Aang says : " What can we do ?
#Text=" Jet says : " The Fire Nation is planning on burning down our forest .
#Text=If you both use waterbending to fill the reservoir , we could fight the fires .
#Text=But if you leave now , they 'll destroy the whole valley .
#Text=" Katara says : " We ca n't leave now with the Fire Nation about to burn down a forest !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm sorry Katara .
#Text=Jet 's very smooth , but we ca n't trust him .
#Text=" Katara says : " You know what I think ?
#Text=You 're jealous that he 's a better warrior and a better leader !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Katara , I 'm not jealous of Jet .
#Text=It 's just that my instinct — " Katara says : " Well my instincts tell me we need to stay here a little longer and help Jet .
#Text=Come on Aang .
#Text=" Aang says : " Sorry , Sokka .
#Text=" Jet says : " Let 's go .
#Text=" Jet says : " Now listen , you are not to blow the dam until I give the signal .
#Text=If the reservoir is n't full , the Fire Nation troops could survive .
#Text=" The Duke says : " But what about the people in the town , wo n't they get wiped out too ?
#Text=" Jet says : " Look Duke , that 's the price of ridding this area of the Fire Nation .
#Text=Now do n't blow the dam until I give the signal — got it ?
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " Where do you think you 're going , ponytail ?
#Text=" Jet says : " Sokka , I 'm glad you decided to join us .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I heard your plan to destroy the Earth Kingdom town .
#Text=" Jet says : " Our plan is to rid the valley of the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Sokka says : " There are people living there , Jet ; mothers and fathers and children .
#Text=" Jet says : " We ca n't win without making some sacrifices .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You lied to Aang and Katara about the forest fire !
#Text=" Jet says : " Because they do n't understand the demands of war .
#Text=Not like you and I do .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do understand .
#Text=I understand that there 's nothing you wo n't do to get what you want .
#Text=" Jet says : " I was hoping you 'd have an open mind , but I can see you 've made your choice .
#Text=" Jet says : " I ca n't let you warn Katara and Aang .
#Text=Take him for a walk , a long walk .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You ca n't do this !
#Text=" Jet says : " Cheer up , Sokka .
#Text=We 're gon na win a great victory against the Fire Nation today .
#Text=" Katara says : " Jet , I 'm sorry about how Sokka 's been acting .
#Text=" Jet says : " No worries , he already apologized .
#Text=" Aang says : " Really ?
#Text=Sokka apologized ?
#Text=" Jet says : " Yeah , I was surprised too .
#Text=I got the sense that maybe you talked to him or something .
#Text=" Katara says : " Yeah , I did .
#Text=" Jet says : " I guess something you said got through to him .
#Text=Anyhow , he went out on a scouting mission with Pipsqueak and Smellerbee .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm glad he cooled off .
#Text=He 's so stubborn sometimes .
#Text=" Jet says : " All right , we 're here .
#Text=Underground water 's trying to escape through these vents .
#Text=I need you guys to help it along .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 've never used bending on water I ca n't see .
#Text=I do n't know ... " Jet says : " Katara .
#Text=You can do this .
#Text=" Aang says : " What about me ?
#Text=" Jet says : " I know the Avatar can do this .
#Text=" Jet says : " Yes !
#Text=Good job !
#Text=This river empties into the reservoir -- a few more geysers and it 'll be full .
#Text=" Aang says : " Look , there 's another steam vent .
#Text=" Jet says : " Okay .
#Text=You two keep it up , I 'll go check on things at the reservoir .
#Text=" Katara says : " When we 're done we 'll meet you over there .
#Text=" Jet says : " Actually ... probably better if you meet me back at the hideout when you 're done .
#Text=" Aang says : " I bet that 's enough , and I 'm not just saying that to be lazy .
#Text=" Katara says : " Let 's catch up with Jet at the reservoir .
#Text=" Aang says : " I thought we agreed to meet Jet back at the hideout .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , we finished early .
#Text=I 'm sure he 'll be happy to see us .
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " Come on , move along !
#Text=" Sokka says : " How can you stand by and do nothing while Jet wipes out a whole town ?
#Text=" Pipsqueak says : " Hey listen Sokka , Jet 's a great leader .
#Text=We follow what he says , and things always turn out okay .
#Text=" Sokka says : " If that 's how Jet leads , then he 's got a lot to learn .
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " Hey !
#Text=" Sokka says : " While you two are up there , you might want to practice your knot work .
#Text=" Pipsqueak says : " Hey Smellerbee , you gon na eat your lychee nuts ?
#Text=Ooh .
#Text=" Katara says : " What are they doing ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , those are the red barrels he got from the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Katara says : " Why would they need blasting jelly ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Because Jet 's gon na blow up the dam .
#Text=" Katara says : " What ?
#Text=No , that would destroy the town .
#Text=Jet would n't do that .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 've got ta stop him .
#Text=" Katara says : " Jet would n't do that .
#Text=" Jet says : " Yes I would .
#Text=" Katara says : " Jet , why ?
#Text=" Jet says : " Katara , you would too if you just stopped to think .
#Text=Think about what the Fire Nation did to your mother , we ca n't let them do that to anyone else , ever again .
#Text=" Katara says : " This is n't the answer !
#Text=" Jet says : " I want you to understand me Katara .
#Text=I thought your brother would understand , but — " Katara says : " Where 's Sokka ?
#Text=" Jet says : " Katara .
#Text=" Aang says : " I need to get to the dam .
#Text=" Jet says : " You 're not going anywhere without your glider .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm not gon na fight you , Jet .
#Text=" Jet says : " You 'll have to if you want your glider back .
#Text=" Katara says : " Why , Jet ?
#Text=I ca n't believe I trusted you .
#Text=You lied to me , you 're sick and I trusted you !
#Text=What are you doing ?
#Text=" Jet says : " You 're too late .
#Text=" Katara says : " No !
#Text=" Aang says : " Sokka 's still out there , he 's our only chance .
#Text=" Katara says : " Come on , Sokka .
#Text=I 'm sorry I ever doubted you , please .
#Text=" Katara says : " No ... " Aang says : " Sokka did n't make it in time .
#Text=" Katara says : " All those people ... Jet , you monster !
#Text=" Jet says : " This was a victory , Katara .
#Text=Remember that .
#Text=The Fire Nation is gone and this valley will be safe .
#Text=" Sokka says : " It will be safe , without you .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I warned the villagers of your plan , just in time .
#Text=" Jet says : " What ?!
#Text=" Sokka says : " At first they did n't believe me .
#Text=The Fire Nation soldiers assumed I was a spy .
#Text=But one man vouched for me , the old man you attacked .
#Text=He urged them to trust me , and we got everyone out in time .
#Text=" Little girl says : " Misses Pretty !
#Text=" Jet says : " Sokka , you fool !
#Text=We could 've freed this valley !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Who would be free ?
#Text=Everyone would be dead .
#Text=" Jet says : " You traitor !
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , Jet .
#Text=You became the traitor when you stopped protecting innocent people .
#Text=" Jet says : " Katara .
#Text=Please , help me .
#Text=" Katara says : " Goodbye Jet .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yip yip .
#Text=" Aang says : " We thought you were going to the dam .
#Text=How come you went to the town instead ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Let me guess , your instincts told you .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , sometimes they 're right .
#Text=" Aang : says : " Um ... Sokka ?
#Text=You know we 're going the wrong way , right ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " And sometimes they 're wrong .
#Text=" Main Aang Jet Katara Sokka Antagonists Fire Nation soldiers says : " Minor Appa Longshot Momo Old Fire Nation civilian Pipsqueak Smellerbee Sneers The Duke "
